testsuite.name: FileServerTest

The content of the file is: X19FQBS Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 1 Enter filename: > test_purpose_ZLJ4OSDLG.txt The request was sent. The response says that the file was not found! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 3 Enter filename: > test_purpose_HX4PX9MKM.txt The request was sent. The response says that the file was successfully deleted! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > exit The request was sent.
